ir:
For the payable constructor function.
- the state variable owner4 will be updated to 0x906Bd47Fcf07F82B98F28d1e572cA8D2273AA7CD.
- the state variable owner3 will be updated to 0xe0C507cd978F380eac44eDf22Ea734B6c16B5fCF.
- When the ether just received (i.e., msg.value) is 0:
  - the state variable owner2 will be updated to caller.
